Overall the concept of this game is great; you and three other people are to repair broken generators across the map while avoiding a killer. But that's where my appreciation for this game stops. I've pumped out a lot of gameplay in the past few weeks trying to force myself to like the game, but there's simply too many issues with it right now for it to be playable. At first it seemed as if the devs were taking into account the communities complaints and fixing things based off of their suggestions, but the past few weeks this has seemed to stop. 

The biggest issues of the game in my opinion;
- While their update claims to have 'fixed' the matchmaking issues, finding a game can still be excessively long and will often throw you into a game where you're playing people across the world.

- Game is currently incredibly unbalanced IMO, makes it more frustrating than fun to play. Some perks need to be evened out a lot more, and there absolutely needs to be a consequence for killers camping people who are hooked.

- Graphics customization is very limited, as well as sound balancing. The main menu music is incredibly annoying and can't be individually turned down.

- Matchmaking has a HUGE skill-gap. I'm either in a game with brand new players or people with 400 hours in game, there isn't really an inbetween. 

TL;DR: at the moment I wouldn't spend the $20 on this game, it's not quite a finished product yet. I think if some of these issues (along with others) are addressed, it will be a really fun game. But for now I wouldn't bother.

Ich möchte hier nun auch mal meine Meinung zu diesem Spiel abgeben.
Aufteilen werde ich es wie ein normalen Kommentar nunmal. :)

Contra:

- Lange Wartezeiten
  - Hiermit sei gemeint, dass man ständig in den Hauptbildschirm zurückgeworfen wird, wenn man denn mit Freunden  
    sucht. Dies kann ziemlich frustrierend sein, wenn man denn mal Lust hat dieses Spiel zu spielen.
- Community
  - Viele erwarten von diesem Spiel ein non-plus ultra Spiel, welches keine Fehler besitzt und wunderbar zu spielen ist.
     Man kann jetzt schon sagen: Das ist dieses Spiel "noch" nicht. Es besitzt Bugs, es ist noch nicht komplett ausgereift 
     und somit nicht das Spiel, was viele erwarten, wodurch die Spieler dieses Spiel negativ sehen, wie man es auch in den
     Reviewprozenten sehen kann.
- Bugs
  - Die eben gerade schon angesprochenen Bugs. Sie sind nervig, sie verderben einem den Spielspaß. Auf beiden Seiten, 
     sowohl Killer als auch Survivor, gibt es sie.

Pros:

- Spielspaß
  - Das Spiel macht übelsten Spaß, solange man über die Bugs und die Community hinwegsehen kann. Vorallem über die
     Bugs, weswegen ja auch die Community eher negativ geprägt ist. Zudem ist das Devteam immer drauf und dran alles
     irgendwie zu fixen, auch wenn sie es nicht immer schaffen. Wie ich schon sagte, dass Spiel ist "noch" nicht das
     non-plus ultra Spiel, macht aber in dem Stadium in welchem es zur Zeit ist für mich und meine Freunde Spaß.

- Spielgestaltung
  - Das Spiel ist ein gut überlegtes Spiel, wenn man sich mal aufregt, geht man einfach im tryhard-mode als Killer rein und
     regt sich wieder ab, so läuft es zumindest bei mir immer. Man lernt das Spiel durch learning-by-doing und dies ist in
    meinen Augen eines der besten Prinzipien. Selbst wenn man Leute hat, die das Spiel vorher gespielt haben, können sie
    dir maximal das Grundprinzip erklären, lernen musst du es trotzdem. Zudem wird man immer stärker, sowohl als Killer
    als auch als Survivor und das während man das Spiel lernt. Super Prinzip.

- Spielweise
  - Man startet auf einer verlassenen Farm, in einem Wald oder sonst noch wo und versucht zu entkommen. Die 
     Atmossphäre stimmt. Man hat Geräusche die man selbst hervorbringt oder welche aus seiner Umgebung. Sie stimmen 
     dich darauf ein, dass du gleich wahrscheinlich tot bist. Denn wirklich entkommen, schaffst du nur, wenn du beweist, 
     dass du es auch verdient hast. Schaffst du es, feierst du dich zu Tode, aber wenn du stirbst, dann regst du dich darüber
     auf wie blöd doch dein Team sei oder warum der Killer so ein Arsch zu dir ist. Mich persönlich regt es auch auf, wenn
    der Killer mich schnell erwischt und ich reg mich über die gleichen Punkte auf, aber im nachhinein lach ich wiederrum
    drüber, weil ich dann doch mal ne gute Runde hatte.

Zusammenschluss.

In meinen Augen ist dieses Spiel eine Hass-Liebe. Ich kann es nicht durchgängig spielen, da ich sonst wahrscheinlich schon gefühlte 10 neue Mäuse bräuchte, aber wenn es mich mal fesselt, dann richtig. Es macht mir Spaß neue Perkkombinationen herauszufinden, welche man nach und nach freischaltet und ab und zu hab ich auch Spaß an einer Runde in welcher ich gestorben bin. Aber wie ich es auch schon sagte, regt man sich darüber auf, das man als Survivor versagt, dann bringt man einfach andere Survivor zum Versagen und verliert somit seine Frustation. Es ist sozusagen der ewige Salt-Kreislauf von Dead by Daylight. Man verliert als Survivor. Danach bringt man andere Survivor zum verlieren, geht darauf wiederrum wieder als Survivor rein und regt sich nach ein paar Runden wieder auf.
Ich hoffe, dass dieses Spiel weiterhin einen ordentlichen Support enthält, da ich wirklich sehr viel Potenzial in diesem sehe. Zudem ist das Devteam ein ziemlich cooles und spielernahes und es bemüht sich auf alle Fälle kräftig darum, dass dieses Spiel weiterhin gut wird.

Nochmal als Randnotiz:
Jeder hat seine Meinung und ich verstehe auch, warum Menschen dieses Spiel oder das Entwicklerteam als schlecht ansehen. So sollte jedem seine Meinung gelassen werden und wenn Leute das Spiel trotzdem spielen, obwohl sie sich drüber aufregen, dann hat das Entwicklerteam doch das geschafft, was sie wollten. Sie haben es geschafft, dass Menschen von ihrem Spiel gefesselt werden.

It's a very fun game, if you're playing as a survivor that is. The game rewards risky gameplay but for the killers, even safety is punishing.

The devs are very much in favor of nerfing the killers over and over again so that Survivors can get out of situations they put themselves in, to get found out by the killer is a mistake on the survivors side, there is so much juking potential available so getting downed is either a testement to the killers skill, or the survivors lack of game knowledge.

There's a lot more I could go into but to sum it up, I have been in a lobby for 10+ minutes trying to find a solo game, with no game found yet. This is because no killers want to play anymore, Nurse required great skill and strategy to play, but now she is arguably the worst killer. The Trapper used to be the best killer since he could trap off infinite sites and actually play the game fairly. Now he's nerfed and probably second worst.

Tl;dr the devs love survivors and hate killers, the game is unbalanced due to infinite juke spots, camping as a prime deterent to the GLITCH that still has not been patched known as infinites has been nerfed, standing near a hooked survivor ticks down the entity rate. Basically, if you're a survivor main you're gonna wait 15+ minutes for a >20 minute game, and if you're a killer, you'll be lucky to kill one person in each game.

不 推荐，
游戏的质感非常不错，但是国服人类逃生者80%无限绕无敌房无限绕LT导致目前游戏的体验很差，尤其是屠夫，段位等级升高之后真心玩的没什么意思，体验糟糕透了
关于无敌房和LT
作为中国玩家，国服屠夫太少而且游戏体验太差，导致现在逃生者很难几分钟内匹配到1个屠夫房间内，玩逃生者的人多而玩屠夫的人少，这么长时间的匹配机制就表现出同段位逃生者玩家要很久才能排队进入1个同段位屠夫的房间。归根结底，问题就是无限绕无敌房和LT导致的逃生者屠夫游戏体验的大大不平衡.
无敌房可以理解，给人类一个摆脱屠夫的中转站，提高逃生者的生还率。屠夫只要你敢追我就敢让你追不到，耗时间。
别说屠夫可以套路破寒风农场的LT，对于老玩家因为透光可以观察到屠夫站位那确实就是无敌房，你套路有万千，他就是不吃你这一套的大有人在，就算被套路了，老司机也能在LT拖你屠夫个几分钟不成问题。这一点当屠夫玩上高段位之后，确实很伤很难玩。追1个1个进无敌房，追4个4个进无敌房无限绕，
可不可以像这样
1无敌房逃生者可以进，屠夫不可以进，但无敌房必须远离发电机和农场隔离一段较长的距离。修电机就要有死的觉悟，逃生者要有8成以上的死亡概率，不能很容易就跑回无敌房，必须要逃较长距离并需要依靠翻板子跳窗等等做出应对
2无敌房的人类可以根据屠夫强弱选择出或不出，待几分钟不出的逃生者自动退出房间，给予逃生者和屠夫相应的点数。或者当发电机修复达到一定数量，逃生者不能进入无敌房，只能开启逃生门逃生
3无敌房人类可以直接传送到农场随机一处位置，与屠夫有相应距离，但要给屠夫一个爆点提示
4修改LT，改成像双T，1 11，括号板子那种容错率的障碍图，现在的LT只要人类站在合适的点位做应对，屠夫到死都追不到的。跟现在的无敌房一样是存在BUG点的。比如LT中间开窗口的那栏两边距离缩短，就不会出现无限绕LT而屠夫无法追上的问题，同时逃生者依然有依靠它摆脱屠夫的机会。寒风农场LT实体不能透光那也能大大提高逃生者和屠夫的博弈空间
5隔离无敌房后可以增加地图板子数量，双T，1 11各种那样的障碍物，屠夫走错弄丢人，人走错挨刀。增加可玩性。


这样不就平衡多了么？那时候才看的出来哪些真人皇哪些真屠皇。而且新人如果觉得屠夫太强，肯定上树，那摸1个2个发电机就赶紧偷偷撤到无敌房，可以拿豆到时间自动出房也可以选择想得分就继续出来修电机。对于退出房间的人系统可以对修过的电机做出相应调整，来保证屠夫被修好的电机数维持一定的平衡，不影响后续的未退出房间的人类和屠夫的游戏体验。


现在人类依靠着无敌点同时完全不影响修发电机，逼迫走了多少屠夫退出这个游戏？出现了太多的屠夫拔线退游戏，开迅雷限制网速把逃生者都卡掉等等情况。又消耗长时间同时发电机修复的又快，逃生者修电机修半天屠夫上去砍一刀，逃生者直接弹射进无敌房，治疗好了再出来继续修发电机继续浪，挨一刀再回无敌房，以此无限循环大大降低游戏的可玩性，降低了双方的游戏体验。典型例子精神病院图和2层小楼。毕竟屠夫只有一个，人类有四个，死守守不过来的。

请不要把无敌房和LT的不平衡归结到玩家的喜欢钻空子，希望官方能够把这些存在BUG点不平衡的地方修复掉，让玩家没有BUG可利用。让逃生者有死亡体验同时有逃出的机会，同时屠夫不会把怨气抱怨给这些不公平的BUG点上。

I've played the game beginning three months after release and have been a part of its community since I began playing.

The two massive downsides are at both ends of the spectrum: low-ranked play and high-ranked play.

This game is simply not new-player friendly. It is more difficult for new players who are choosing to play Survivor versus Killer, however, even the Killer side is difficult. It just has a huge learning curve.

This game is just tough for high-rank Killers. Once a player has enough understanding of the game to reach high-rank play, it becomes apparent Survivors are not as helpless as once perceived. Interestingly enough, at this end of the spectrum, it is just flat out tougher for a Killer versus Survivor.

Short, simple, and sweet. Now, buy the game and join my lobby as a victim.

This means if you play on a screen like me that is 5760 x 1080 you get to see nothing but the middle 3rd of the game display this means as a survivor you do not get to see pretty much anything of the game other than your character and when hiding tracking the killer you are VERY LIMITED. Similarly if you are the killer there is a very good chance you will not be able to catch the survivors simply because they can dance around your field of view as it is very limited.

I advised them of this in the Alpha, Beta and when it went live and it was all ignored, they have no intention of resolving this major bug (it's veryy simple to resolve as well) and continue to ignore anything you say that will affect the GFX in game.

I mark this game with a low 1/10 because of this reason and I also do not rate Behaviour as a good or decent games developer for this reason as well.

I would ask that if you have a game display that is wide screen to avoid playing this rubbish and concentrate on something else.

•	What is Dead by Daylight? *Updated 12/24/2016*  edits * * 
o	DBD is Horror game focusing on 1 v 4 asymmetrical gameplay Killer vs Survivors. While most horror games today focus too much of its scare factor on jump scares to accomplish its task DBD takes another approach gradually increasing tension. The tension brought on by the sense of your impending demise and the heart beat building intensity, or for killers the sound of completed generators which signals that the amount of time you have left to sacrifice the survivors is almost up. Or sneaky survivors which you have a hard time tracking down. DBD puts 4 survivors against a killer who must repair five generators and work as a team before they scarified by meat hook to the entity.

•	The Good: 
o	I love this game, and would recommend you to give it a try. 
o	Randomly generated maps and layout
o	As of 9/28/16 the game IS NOT a jam packed DLC cash cow with micro transactions *Every DLC except for the nurse you would have to pay for* 
o	Feeling of a 80s horror movie where at any moment the killer could be right over your shoulder. 
o	The soundtrack and heartbeats as the killer grows nearer always puts you at a state of unease and is spot on (even with ~200 hours in it still feels uneasy)  *survivors are no longer scared of the killer bc of their perks* 
o	Even though Evolve (Original Not Stage 2) and this game focus on asymmetrical gameplay do not compare them; that would not be doing this game justice. 
o	The problem of unbalanced matchmaking *hasnt been fixed*
o	Fairly low $20 price tag
o	Devs seem very passionate about their project so the game should have frequent updates, support, and future content. 

•	The Bad: 
o	The Bugs: At launch the game was very buggy but with frequent updates the game feels a bit smoother, but you will encounter some bugs, like all games. *Still many bugs months later* 
o	The game favors survivors most killers are no longer viable against survivor perks and try hard survive with friends* 
o	Infinites and campers *the problem now is survivors the meta builds desisive strike / self care / adrenaline / sabotage* makes most veteran survivors unkillable* 
o	Unsure of the Devs direction on future DLC plans *all payed* 
o	Getting out of rank 20 hell (~ 16 – 20) can be a nightmare bc of inexperienced survivors
o	Laggy killers need for dedicated servers *still*
	Simply type 1 repeatedly in the lobby chat to test for lag. 
o	Every perk on both sides should feel as a viable option to match a certain playstyle but this is not the case, some perks such as iron grasps on the killer side are absolutely mandatory while others are a waste of a slot
o	A few killers use macro bots (depending on your outlook can be a hindrance or a quick way to farm points for both parties). 
o	Would like to see more emotes or proxy voice communication (restricted to a limited distance for survivors) 
o	Would like to see an additional game mode / focus on completing a different randomly decided objective rather than generators every game. 

•	Final Thoughts: 
o	Don’t let the number of problems that I brought up dissuade you from purchasing the game. The game is amazing and the unique dynamic between killer vs survivors and an altruistic team focused survivor group vs a selfish group that views itself as individuals that hasn’t been matched in any game that I have seen. You can read all the reviews on steam, but until you play it you will never know if a game is right for you. The game does have a few problems but what game doesn’t these days. Once a problem is found the devs usually get taken care of in a timely manner. I would like to see more item diversity on the survivor’s side. As of today I would rate DBD an 8/10 it has a few problems but does several new things for gaming and does them quite well. 

•	TIPS: Your focus while playing shouldn’t be to kill everyone or simply survive you must entertain the ominous prescience known as the entity in several ways if you wish to rank up, completing objectives surviving, helping teammates etc. If you face camp survivors on the hook not only does it take away from the overall fun for survivors,but you don’t get nearly as many points for chasing the survivors usually results in a derank. 
•	Learn how to hide, and remain calm, the killer can only see your tracks when you run so use this to your advantage. 
•	Repairing the generators to 99% and not completing it is a strong option for survivors, killers have more generators to patrol meaning that they are less likely to find you. 
•	Survivors can now crouch past and crouch next to crows without setting them off. This is a new hiding option for survivors that is quite effective, most killers even the more experienced ones will look for alerted crows to see if a survivor has been in the area and will not walk near them in fear of setting them off themselves. 
•	At the start of the trail look for a hook first, each killer has their own hook allowing you to identify the killer and lets you prepare a strategy against that killer, also watch you should watch out for. 
. Killers also have their own distinct sound grunts, chainsaw, bells, claps of a trap, shrieks etcs to let you know which killer it is. 
•	Also at the start of the trail try to get a sense of where the killer is before starting a gen, a generator with little to no progress is often an indicator that a survivor is near. 
•	Learn how to do the quick time skill checks and master getting great skill checks. 
o	Failing the skill checks not only slows down the time it takes for healing sabotaging a repairing but it also alerts the killer to you location which could compromise a whole team. 
•	If you are on the fence about purchasing the game I would say go ahead and try it out. I hope the tips that I provided will allow you to get out of survivor hell and rank high in no time.

I as a veteran from release am very displeased with the way the game is heading down. Multiple balance changes that seem to come from nowhere and harm the health of the game from even an average player's perspective. 

This game has a steepish learning curve, what these developers are trying to do at the moment is lessen that, which in itself isn't a bad thing. What's wrong is people who've sunk that time and effort in are getting the short end of the stick. If you decide to play killer, you're going to be in for a stress-inducing role that rewards you with very little. As it is a 1v4 game, killers (the 1) are really not in a good position today. What baffles me is they have a dedicated forum for feedback that's bursting at the seems with activity. But it seems like no one on the team really cares about what is being said. Not to mention the vast majority of what is posted there is in conflict with the devs decisions. It's hard to find a post praising the developers, hard.

They are catering to new players like you. But when you become well-acquainted with this game you will soon learn the gaping flaws in it all and the blind eye the team will give to those of high-skill.

It didn't always use to be this way. Back in 2016-2017 balance was terrible, but at that time no one knew what they were doing. There was active efforts to make the game genuinely better. But it seems we aren't addressing the real problems, instead using a bandaid to cover up the laceration.

I'll be honest, in its infancy DBD had some of the most generous devs around. We got TWO free DLCs with some of the highest tier characters in this game. That's outstanding in terms of pay to win. But today it seems less and less wholesome. I don't know what happened.

This game is fun. You will likely accumulate hundreds of hours. But in the end I fear you might end up like me, veteran leftovers. I've spent many years attatched to this game, its community, and it's competitive scene. It breaks my heart to see something I loved so much and for so long go down the wrong path. So from one gamer to another, this might not be something you want to invest in.
